document.full_text: a higher-than-expected budget deficit in portugal and the need for more money to rescue ireland's failing banks have renewed fears that europe's debt crisis is worsening despite its sizable bailout fund.
document.title: setbacks in portugal and ireland renew worry on debt crisis
lines_and_colors: a higher-than-expected budget deficit in portugal and the need for more money to rescue ireland's failing banks have renewed fears that europe's debt crisis is worsening despite its sizable bailout fund.
